query:
SELECT l.id as loja_id, l.nome as loja_nome, gl.gestorId, u.name as gestor_atual
FROM lojas l
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON l.id = gl.lojaId
LEFT JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
WHERE LOWER(l.nome) IN ('abrantes', 'aeroporto porto', 'águeda', 'algés', 'almada', 'amadora', 'amoreiras')
ORDER BY l.nome;

LEFT JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
WHERE LOWER(l.nome) IN ('abrantes', 'aeroporto porto', 'águeda', 'algés', 'almada', 'amadora', 'amoreiras')
